an5.170:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
an5.170:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā bhaddaji yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
an5.170:4.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an5.170:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ bhaddajiṃ āyasmā ānando etadavoca:
an5.170:4.6: “kiṃ nu kho, āvuso bhaddaji, dassanānaṃ aggaṃ, kiṃ savanānaṃ aggaṃ, kiṃ sukhānaṃ aggaṃ, kiṃ saññānaṃ aggaṃ, kiṃ bhavānaṃ aggan”ti?
an5.170:5.1: “Atthāvuso, brahmā abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī, yo taṃ brahmānaṃ passati, idaṃ dassanānaṃ aggaṃ.
an5.170:5.2: Atthāvuso, ābhassarā nāma devā sukhena abhisannā parisannā.
an5.170:5.5: Yo taṃ saddaṃ suṇāti, idaṃ savanānaṃ aggaṃ.
an5.170:5.7: Te santaṃyeva tusitā sukhaṃ paṭivedenti, idaṃ sukhānaṃ aggaṃ.
an5.170:5.8: Atthāvuso, ākiñcaññāyatanūpagā devā, idaṃ saññānaṃ aggaṃ.
an5.170:5.9: Atthāvuso, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpagā devā, idaṃ bhavānaṃ aggan”ti.
an5.170:5.10: “Sameti kho idaṃ āyasmato bhaddajissa, yadidaṃ bahunā janenā”ti?
an5.170:6.5: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā bhaddaji āyasmato ānandassa paccassosi.
an5.170:7.1: “Yathā passato kho, āvuso, anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, idaṃ dassanānaṃ aggaṃ.
an5.170:7.2: Yathā suṇato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, idaṃ savanānaṃ aggaṃ.
an5.170:7.3: Yathā sukhitassa anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, idaṃ sukhānaṃ aggaṃ.
an5.170:7.4: Yathā saññissa anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, idaṃ saññānaṃ aggaṃ.
an5.170:7.5: Yathā bhūtassa anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, idaṃ bhavānaṃ aggan”ti.
